CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The low J SC values of P5 and P6 were unexpected , considering the lower band gaps of P5 ( 1.49 eV ) and P6 ( 1.55 eV ) compared to that of P7 ( 1.85 eV ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P5 |
| P6 |
| P7 |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are P5, P6, and P7. These are the materials being compared in terms of their J SC values and band gaps.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |

| P6 |
| P7 |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are P5, P6, and P7. These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they are the only explicitly mentioned materials.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low J SC values |

After reviewing the paragraph, I have determined that there are only two clear "Material Property" entities: "low J SC values" and "lower band gaps". These properties are being compared or referred to in the text and are specific to the materials being discussed. The phrase "that of P7" is not a clear material property and has been removed from the list.
